entry.title: Some Pole Moves
entry.content:
Feeling better with all of these! Handstand is still scarey, but I feel like my figurehead is improving. Catgirl is looking good too, but having trouble getting her long beautiful legs over for the reiko ğŸ˜.

Oh, I also need to remember to look to the outside for chair spins, it seemed to help a lot and it looks pretty. I feel like I might try to test into L3 soon.

[[video:pole-reiko-figurehead]][[video:pole-handstand-cupid]]
